extension.summary: Backup LibreELEC system to local or remote storage
extension.description: Backup and restore your LibreELEC configuration, addons, and user data. Supports local and remote storage (SMB, NFS, FTP, SFTP, WebDAV). Configurable compression level and retention policy.
extension.news:
